function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Reliance on data from food truck practices","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Emphasis on resilience during environmental uncertainty","category":"Nature","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases from food truck interactions","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid changes in the food truck business model in response to covid-19","category":"Nature","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exposing consumers to covid-19 through dining out","category":"Public Space","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases within the local communities and project construction site due to increased interaction and proximity.","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of inadequate sanitation and waste management practices leading to the contamination of water sources and the spread of waterborne diseases.","category":"Water","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Possible spread of contagious diseases due to increased tourist activity in local communities","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate waste management leading to environmental contamination and health hazards","category":"Water","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Proximity to amacayacu national park and rich biodiversity may increase the risk of exposure to contagious diseases","category":"Biodiversity","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of hygiene and sanitation practices in hospitality training could lead to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Public Space","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Former hunters, now working as wildlife keepers, may still pose a risk of disease transmission due to their previous hunting activities and close contact with wildlife.","category":"Nature","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Introduction of non-organic waste to indigenous communities","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of waste management
